display_long_description:
Hone your skills and experience basketball like never before with VR Hoopzter! Choose from various courts, including indoor arenas, outdoor stadiums, and street courts, to compete in 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 modes. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a beginner, our intuitive controls make it easy to learn and play.

Select your favorite ball from over ten unique options to fit your style and play with confidence. With voice chat, you can communicate with your teammates in real time, making the game even more immersive. If you're looking for a unique challenge, try our popular "horse" mode, where you can test your creativity and skill by taking difficult shots.

Experience the future of gaming with our groundbreaking mixed reality mode! Using Quest's passthrough technology, transform your own space into a basketball court. Place a virtual hoop anywhere in your room and start shooting. Practice your jump shots in your living room, perfect your free throws in your backyard, or challenge friends to a game of HORSE in your garage. This mode seamlessly blends the virtual and real worlds, providing an unparalleled, personalized basketball experience right in your own environment.

VR Hoopzter is perfect for basketball fans and gamers alike. With customizable meta avatars, exciting game modes, and the innovative mixed reality feature, you'll never run out of fun and challenges. Experience the thrill of basketball like never before with VR Hoopzter!
